name: df-trkgc
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cstrkgc, cab(s0, wsbc(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(cds, cv(s0)), wa(wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wceq(co(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s4)), co(cv(s4), cv(s2), cv(s3))))), wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wral(s5, cv(s1), wi(wceq(co(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s4)), co(cv(s5), cv(s2), cv(s5))), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s4)))))))))))
comment: Define the class of geometries fulfilling the congruence axioms of reflexivity, identity and transitivity. These are axioms A1 to A3 of [Schwabhauser] p. 10. With our distance based notation for congruence, transitivity of congruence boils down to transitivity of equality and is already given by ~ eqtr , so it is not listed in this definition. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Aug-2017.)
